oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Rear view of the Administration Building (Barry Hall)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Buildings; Educational facilities; Barry Hall (Administration Building)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Administration Building (Barry Hall) was constructed during the presidency of Brother Hyacinth Richard Gerlach. Plans had been made some years previously, but funding ($355,451 for the contractors and $12,192 for the architects) came available.
